Atinlay Igpay.name: Atinlay Igpay
Atinlay Igpay.text:
Oubleday ikestray
Eneverwhay Atinlay Igpay's ontrollercay eaksspay ay onnay-Igpay-Atinlay ordway, acrificesay Atinlay Igpay.

AWOL.name: AWOL
AWOL.text: Remove target attacking creature from the game. Then remove it from the removed-from-game zone and put it into the absolutely-removed-from-the-freaking-game-forever zone.

Bosom Buddy.name: Bosom Buddy
Bosom Buddy.text: Whenever you play a spell, you may gain ½ life for each word in that spell's name.
